name: rncnvcnv

body.origin:
|- wceq(crn(ccnv(ccnv(c0))), crn(c0))
-| wceq(crn(c0), cdm(ccnv(c0)))
-| wceq(cdm(ccnv(c0)), crn(ccnv(ccnv(c0))))
body.pretty:
⊢ ran(`' `' c0)= ran(c0)
⊣ ran(c0)= dom(`' c0)
⊣ dom(`' c0)= ran(`' `' c0)

|- wceq(crn(ccnv(ccnv(c0))), crn(c0))

-| wceq(cdm(ccnv(c0)), crn(ccnv(ccnv(c0))))

comment: The range of the double converse of a class. (Contributed by NM, 8-Apr-2007.)
